BundleInfo.name: ChimeraX-crai
BundleInfo.Author: Vincent Mallet
BundleInfo.Synopsis: This tool takes a density as input and returns the predicted position of Fabs/Fvs or VHHs (as templates)
BundleInfo.Description: This tool is based on the preprint Finding Antibodies in Cryo-EM densities with CrAI (https://www.biorxiv.org/content/10.1101/2023.09.27.559736v1). It uses a deep learning model and an object detection formulation to place Fabs or VHHs into a density. Importantly, the tool works on low resolutions and large maps with a reasonable runtime (seconds, minutes for large maps).

Classifiers.ChimeraXClassifier: ChimeraX :: Command :: crai :: General :: Predict antibodies in cryo-EM densities
